#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

   int main ()
       {
       
       int t;
       
      scanf("%d",&t);
       while (t--) {
           
           long long int n,i,j,a[100001],c=0,flag =0;
          scanf("%lld",&n);
          
           for(i = 0 ;i < n ;i++) {
               
              scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
               
           }
           if(n == 1) {
              printf("YES\n");
               continue;
           }
           sort(a,a+n);
           c = 0;
           for(i =0 ;i<n;i++) {
               
               if(c < (a[i] - 1)) {
                   
                   flag =1;
                   break;
               }
               else
               c =c + a[i];
           }
           if(flag==1) {
              printf("NO\n");
           }
           else{
               printf("YES\n");
           }
           
           
           
           
       }
      
       
      
       return 0;
   }
